items.sentence: Tom wanted me to tell Mary that he wasn\'t coming.
I\'m not sure if I\'m going to be able to do that.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom won\'t agree to do that.
Tom may have said that, but I don\'t think he did.
Tom often reads when his children aren\'t at home.
She married him only because her parents made her.
She was born in 1946, on August 19, in California.
She was ready to help him with cleaning the house.
Some flowers bloom in spring and others in autumn.
Stop beating around the bush and get to the point.
